text:
I'm excited by the potential of steering generative AI
+
just discovered buildspace & it's fun

So for s5 I'm going to build an application for steering image diffusion models, focused on making short videos.

cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends https://t.co/LJByeCDpNw
